resources.string:
Hi, my name is Juan Rodriguez. 

Systems Engineer at Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, 
responsible, creative, proactive, attentive to new technologies and updates them. 

Ability on teamwork, design and implement computer solutions to form a solid technological system, technical and human infrastructure for the benefit of society. 

\Knowledge in programming, database, with emphasis in Software Construction and Software Architecture, certified in agile SCRUM methodology. Extensive mastery of programming languages C#, .NET, Visual Basic, SQL, IOS Swift, Android, Java and C++. 

Competence in the stages of design, planning and execution processes in Software Architecture and application development. 

Special interest in specialization in Project Management, Software Engineering, Enterprise Architecture, mobile and related applications.
